member.name: T:Tortuga.Chain.Core.OleDbCommandExecutionToken

member.name: T:Tortuga.Chain.Metadata.OleDbDatabaseMetadataCache`1
member.summary: Meatadata cache base class for OleDB databases
member.typeparam: The type used to represent database object names.

member.name: M:Tortuga.Chain.Metadata.OleDbDatabaseMetadataCache`1.ToClrType(System.Data.OleDb.OleDbType,System.Boolean,System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Returns the CLR type that matches the indicated database column type.
member.param: If nullable, Nullable versions of primitive types are returned.
Optional length. Used to distinguish between a char and string. Defaults to string.
member.returns: A CLR type or NULL if the type is unknown.
member.remarks: This does not take into consideration registered types.
